trans-unit.source: Represents a single data point collected from the digitizer and stylus.
A <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> collects data when a user inputs ink using the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>データを収集して、ユーザーは、デジタイザーを使用してインクを入力します。

trans-unit.source: Because the information that a digitizer reports differs depending on the manufacturer, the properties within a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> can vary.
trans-unit.target: デジタイザーを報告する情報は、製造元に含まれるプロパティによって異なりますので、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>異なることができます。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a property is in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: プロパティが内にあるかどうかを決定する、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>を呼び出し、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A>メソッドです。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description%2A> property contains a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that specifies which properties are in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description%2A>プロパティが含まれています、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>のどのプロパティを指定する、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>です。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects contain properties that specify the (x, y) coordinates, as well as the pressure.
trans-unit.target: すべて<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>オブジェクトに指定するプロパティを含める (x, y) 座標、だけでなく、負荷します。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets property names and values for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 次の例の各プロパティの名前と値を取得する<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>で、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>です。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> called `packetOutput`.
trans-unit.target: この例では、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>と呼ばれる`packetOutput`です。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> class.
The x-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
The y-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> class using specified (x, y) coordinates.
The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 次の例で作成する方法、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>です。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
The y-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
The amount of pressure applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> class using specified (x, y) coordinates and pressure.
`pressureFactor` must have a value between 0 and 1, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: `pressureFactor` 0 ~ 1 の値が必要です。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates that no pressure is applied, while a value of 1 indicates that the maximum amount of pressure is applied.
trans-unit.target: 値 0 は、負荷を適用しないこと、値が 1 の最大負荷の量が適用されることを示しを示します。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.5 indicates that 50% of the maximum pressure is applied, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 値 0.5 は、最大負荷の 50% が適用されるにことを示します。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 次の例で作成する方法、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>です。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pressureFactor" /> is less than 0 or greater than 1.
The x-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
The y-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
The amount of pressure applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that specifies the additional properties stored in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
An array of 32-bit signed integers that contains the values of the properties defined in <c>stylusPointDescription</c>.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> class using specified (x, y) coordinates, a <paramref name="pressureFactor" />, and additional parameters specified in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.
The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 次の例で作成する方法、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>です。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pressureFactor" /> is less than 0 or greater than 1.
-or-
The values in <paramref name="additionalValues" /> that correspond to button properties are not 0 or 1.
The number of values in <paramref name="additionalValues" /> does not match the number of properties in <paramref name="stylusPointDescription" /> minus 3.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that specifies the properties stored in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> specifies the properties stored in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />に格納されているプロパティを指定します、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />です。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description%2A> property to get property values from <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 次の例では、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description%2A>プロパティを取得するプロパティの値から<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>で、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>です。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> called `packetOutput`.
trans-unit.target: この例では、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>と呼ばれる`packetOutput`です。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects for equality.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
Returns a value indicating whether the specified object is equal to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The following example checks two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: 次の例では、2 つ確認<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>オブジェクトが等しいかどうか。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> properties on `point1` and `point2` are set to the same value, the "The two StylusPoint objects are equal."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>、および<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A>プロパティを`point1`と`point2`同じに設定値に設定する、「2 つの StylusPoint オブジェクトが等しいです」。

trans-unit.source: Message appears.
trans-unit.target: メッセージが表示されます。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The following example checks two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects for equality.

The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare.
Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects are equal.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> that specifies which property value to get.
Returns the value of the specified property.
The value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.

To check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> contains the specified property, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A> before calling either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.GetPropertyValue%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.SetPropertyValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 確認するかどうか、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>呼び出し、指定したプロパティが含まれています、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A>いずれかを呼び出す前に、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.GetPropertyValue%2A>メソッドまたは<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.SetPropertyValue%2A>メソッドです。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks for the existence of a stylus point property before getting the property's value.
trans-unit.target: 次の例では、プロパティの値を取得する前に、スタイラス ポイントの存在を確認します。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> called `point`.
trans-unit.target: この例では、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>と呼ばれる`point`です。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylusPointProperty" /> is not one of the properties in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> to check for in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
Returns whether the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> contains the specified property.

<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> is in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

To check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> contains the specified property, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A> before calling either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.GetPropertyValue%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.SetPropertyValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 確認するかどうか、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>呼び出し、指定したプロパティが含まれています、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A>いずれかを呼び出す前に、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.GetPropertyValue%2A>メソッドまたは<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.SetPropertyValue%2A>メソッドです。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks for the existence of a stylus point property before getting the property's value.
trans-unit.target: 次の例では、プロパティの値を取得する前に、スタイラス ポイントの存在を確認します。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> called `point`.
trans-unit.target: この例では、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>と呼ばれる`point`です。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the largest valid value for a pair of (x, y) coordinates.
The following example ensures that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> is set to a legal value.
trans-unit.target: 次の例は、確実、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>のプロパティ、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>が有効な値に設定します。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the smallest valid value for a pair of (x, y) coordinates.
The following example ensures that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> is set to a legal value.
trans-unit.target: 次の例は、確実、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>のプロパティ、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>が有効な値に設定します。

The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: この演算子を同等の方法は、します。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Equals%28System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint%2CSystem.Windows.Input.StylusPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The following example checks two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: 次の例では、2 つ確認<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>オブジェクトが等しいかどうか。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> properties on `point1` and `point2` are set to the same value, the "The two StylusPoint objects are equal."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>、および<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A>プロパティを`point1`と`point2`同じに設定値に設定する、「2 つの StylusPoint オブジェクトが等しいです」。

trans-unit.source: Message appears.
trans-unit.target: メッセージが表示されます。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to cast to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
Casts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that contains the same (x,y) coordinates as <paramref name="stylusPoint" />.
The following example demonstrates how to cast a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> to a <xref:System.Windows.Point> object to draw a circle at the beginning of every stroke.
trans-unit.target: 次の例では、キャスト、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>を<xref:System.Windows.Point>すべてストロークの先頭に円を描画するオブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> object called `inkcanvas1` and that the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown> event is connected to the event handler in the example.
trans-unit.target: この例があること、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>と呼ばれるオブジェクト`inkcanvas1`ことと、<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown>イベントは、例では、イベント ハンドラーに関連付けられています。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare.
Returns a Boolean value which indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects are unequal.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects are unequal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is the negation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Equals%2A>
trans-unit.target: この演算子を同等の方法の否定であります。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.target: 次の例では、2 つのチェック<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>の非等値オブジェクトです。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> properties on `point1` and `point2` are set to the same value, the "The two StylusPoint objects are equal."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>、および<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A>プロパティを`point1`と`point2`同じに設定値に設定する、「2 つの StylusPoint オブジェクトが等しいです」。

trans-unit.source: Message appears.
trans-unit.target: メッセージが表示されます。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value between 0 and 1 that reflects the amount of pressure the stylus applies to the digitizer's surface when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> is created.
Value between 0 and 1 indicating the amount of pressure the stylus applies to the digitizer's surface as the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: スタイラスがデジタイザーの画面としてに適用する負荷の量を示す 0 から 1 までの値、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />を作成します。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> property is expressed as a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 値、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A>プロパティは、0 ~ 1 の値として表されます。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates that no pressure is applied, while a value of 1 indicates that the maximum amount of pressure is applied.
trans-unit.target: 値 0 は、負荷を適用しないこと、値が 1 の最大負荷の量が適用されることを示しを示します。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.5 indicates that 50% of the maximum pressure is applied, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 値 0.5 は、最大負荷の 50% が適用されるにことを示します。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> property to retrieve and display the pressure value for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> called `points`.
trans-unit.target: 次の例では、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A>プロパティを取得し、各の不足値を表示する<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>で、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>と呼ばれる`points`です。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> called `packetOutput`.
trans-unit.target: この例では、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>と呼ばれる`packetOutput`です。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor" /> property is set to a value less than 0 or greater than 1.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> that specifies which property value to set.
The value of the property.
Sets the specified property to the specified value.

To check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> contains the specified property, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A> before calling either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.GetPropertyValue%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.SetPropertyValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 確認するかどうか、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>呼び出し、指定したプロパティが含まれています、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A>いずれかを呼び出す前に、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.GetPropertyValue%2A>メソッドまたは<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.SetPropertyValue%2A>メソッドです。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks for the existence of a stylus point property before setting the property's value.
trans-unit.target: 次の例では、プロパティの値を設定する前に、スタイラス ポイントの存在を確認します。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> called `point`.
trans-unit.target: この例では、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>と呼ばれる`point`です。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylusPointProperty" /> is not one of the properties in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description" />.
Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> structure.
Gets or sets the value for the x-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
The x-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> の x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A> property for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 次の例の取得、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>それぞれのプロパティ<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>で、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>です。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> called `packetOutput`.
trans-unit.target: この例では、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>と呼ばれる`packetOutput`です。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
The y-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> の y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A> property for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> called `packetOutput`.
